var.name: description
var.string: The text that is initially displayed in the search/index text field. Search query corresponds to all or part of a learners' name and page number corresponds to a specific page of learners. The user will enter something and then click on the 'Go' button, after which the results will be displayed.

var.name: value
var.string: 請輸入搜尋字串或介於1和{0}頁碼

var.name: description
var.string: This error message appears if the search/index field is blank when the user clicks the 'Go' button.

var.name: description
var.string: This error message appears if the number entered by the user lies outside the range of viewable pages.

var.name: description
var.string: This message appears when the search does not find any learners whose names contain the search parameter.

var.name: description
var.string: {0} is the page we are on now and {1} is the number of pages

var.name: description
var.string: If the learner entered text into the index/search field, clicking this button will search all started learners names for the text they entered, otherwise if they entered a number and clicked go. It will show the contents of the page, whose number they entered.

var.name: description
var.string: When the user clicks this button, they will be returning from the search view to the index view. It will once again allow them to view all the available pages, and navigate to them directly. This button is only visible when the user is in the search view.

var.name: description
var.string: Tooltip message for close button on Branching canvas.

var.name: value
var.string: 你確定要強制學習者{0}結束該分支流程嗎？

var.name: description
var.string: This confirmation dialog appears after a learner icon has been dropped on the finish door within the branching view.

var.name: value
var.string: {0}不能被強制拖到不同分支或流程的活動中

var.name: description
var.string: This alert appears when either: The learner is in a branching sequence and the monitor tries to force complete them to an activity in a different branching sequence, or: the learner is in an optional sequence and the monitor tries to force complete them to an activity in a different optional sequence

var.name: description
var.string: Displayed when we want the Teacher to moderate an activitiy (for example a chat room)

var.name: description
var.string: Of an Activity: when the content for the Activity must defined in the Lesson (via Monitoring) rather than by the Author

var.name: description
var.string: A type of Gate Activity where progress depends on permission from a Teacher

var.name: description
var.string: A type of Gate Activity where progress depends on all Learners in the Class or Group reaching the activity

var.name: description
var.string: Allows the Teacher to add the learners to chosen groups

var.name: description
var.string: Any 'Contributions' to be made by a monitor, such as editing text for 'Define in Monitor' tasks, marking essay/reports, releasing stop points, etc.

var.name: description
var.string: A System Gate is a stop point that can be controlled by time setting or user control

var.name: description
var.string: A type of branching where the Teacher chooses which learners to add to each branch
